status.full_text: Make a statement against #AIDS: @dotHIV #WMD http://t.co/Wf5DRorlYh
http://t.co/C2Na81AIif This is a great hack ... you can't have secure plug&play, so we'll probably have sth. like bluetooth pairing.
http://t.co/fImpi8Z38g is a badge for software companies who keep their software and data only on German soil.
http://t.co/22tE9DK1QW "You don‚Äôt get a flower to grow by pulling on it." Why we don't need performance management.
http://t.co/eutujk3OTC I hate being interrupted but I see the point: if you want to get no noticed as a woman you have to interrupt men.
Don't call 911 if Facebook is down! https://t.co/bBM4p9dhcF
I'll give you 0,1 ‚Ç¨ for 5.000 stellars. https://t.co/BvkcDav89C
@mattsches wollte ich mir mal die Tage anschauen ...
@alexschnapper steht dein Talk noch auf dem #WEMOOF 8 am 25. August? http://t.co/Pewfrv6Yoe
I'll be talking (in german) about #newgTLDs at the next @WEMOOF and how @dotHIV is doing sth good with them:  http://t.co/hMDgpQEw6t #WEMOOF
I did a new timelapse this afternoon: 2.5hrs in 60 seconds. http://t.co/8xKsoMcB9k
@jschirrmacher klar, zur√ºck ist noch Platz ...
@calibanatspace mal die Anwendungen aus der Konsole gestartet? Was sagt dmesg? Platte voll?
@calibanatspace Aber einen Neustart hast Du gemacht? Habe auch heute aktualisiert und keine Probleme ...
@gr2m @Ookami86 ‚Ä¶ I suppose that he would leave early, if they did ‚Ä¶
For developing with webhooks ngrok by @inconshreveable is just pure gold: https://t.co/l8zK3H5szy
http://t.co/jHVUKJPeUn is a great writeup how software projects should be done: in iterations, with lots of feedback, be weary of details.
Remember who resurrected this trend: https://t.co/hFdqkOfRUD http://t.co/C2zJ2doIAV
@SuVuK_ habt ihr einen iCal mit Terminen?
@mattsches http://t.co/mE3Td73lNl hat leider nix ‚Ä¶
http://t.co/M2bLmSkzNL claims that a group of hackers managed to gather passwords of 500M email accounts. Are you using 2-factor auth, yet?
Probably one of the worst sequels? https://t.co/VHYgW4GtOs
.@symfony of course ... RT @phpmagazin: Was ist Euer Lieblings-PHP-Framework? http://t.co/CF8V8Uhjh2 Stimmt ab!
@amokleben Irgendwas von @scalzi !
Arrived @socrates_2014 ... And I smell sheep poop!
#socrates14 started great, with a nice dinner and an awesome world coffee session where I learned that waterscrum is a thing.
@alipasha No harm done. For once they are using their power for the right cause. That's a God I can believe in ‚Ä¶
@alipasha They did before (Google+) and they will again. What I was trying to say is that in total Google improves the web.
@alipasha for me that IS NOT secondary. Although I cannot understand all their motions, I do not feel that they misuse their power.
@alipasha Yes, of course!
@wmfra @cfarivar True. I do sign all my work mail. That's why I don't do work mail on my phone anymore.
@Flyingmana @phpmagazin ‚Ä¶ so then maybe add WordPress, too?!
Returned home from the worlds best conference #socrates2014 ... Still buzzed by all the impressive people I got to meet. Thank you!
Just saw a falling star. That's a sign!
@amokleben aktuell behelfe ich mir mit Scan in PDF und FTP upload auf eine Synology.
@amokleben ist ein Brother Laser-Fax-Scan Kombiger√§t.
@sebastian_nell great Video! "None of us were excellent when we walked in the door ‚Ä¶"
@amokleben @scy -- kann man auch weglassen.
@scy solltest Du beim https://t.co/KEttQJ6Pev bekommen ‚Ä¶
@amokleben und wenn man es nicht selbst hosten m√∂chte, ist @trello die erste Wahl: https://t.co/s6XSGc7mk7
Unser CEO Carolin im Interview mit @foerderland √ºber den langen Weg zu @dotHIV: http://t.co/kw0Jp8yIZx #newgTLDs #HIV #AIDS
@alipasha Du auch?!
Writing your email answer inline in a similar color is the torture instrument of choice for the contemporary corporate slave.
@coworkingmap @OFfenraum is closed.
@EVEJAYDEsign this is tailor made for you: @StartupSucht: Comicademy sucht Superheld als Mitglied der GF (m/w) http://t.co/UN2umh9NmO
Perfect activity for the bad weather: board game night @zentrale_ffm! http://t.co/APYiDwsRLQ
@hr @zentrale_ffm ... and on http://t.co/COZtNbui0J. I subscribed to the iCal feed, too!
@florianbachmann is it any good compared to Monsters Inc.?
http://t.co/Mxi1sgp7iR are tips about creating transactional emails (login, password reset) by the mailgun team.
@benediktdeicke Did you pick one at last?
SSL all the things: https://t.co/xb3nNNWlxr now sports an EV ssl certificate sponsored by @pswgroup. Thanks alot! http://t.co/oUAOu0DpGh
Ran into a limit with @symfony today. You cannot add routes during the compiler pass. I wanted a switchable bundle. A RoutingListener helps.
https://t.co/oHjkjEgxOF To protect and to serve? When you have an assaults rifle and tactical body armor everybody looks like an enemy.
https://t.co/ehxBSR6raH is a great tool to verify and improve your #SSL setup.
Our intern learns, that YouTube has mostly stupid content. Great!
At #SoCraTes14 I explained what I do @dotHIV and by doing so I made an impression on @ikusalic: http://t.co/t7tnuqTKlJ ‚Ä¶ Great to read that!
@hr ‚Ä¶ wir mit 500 Jahren Erfahrung wirbt hat es nicht anders verdient.
Ok, so twitter now shows favorites of followers in the timeline. This messes up my workflow!
@s_bergmann @DB_Bahn daf√ºr nutze ich http://t.co/N3Tq7SXfGt
@amokleben der Markt ist auch in Berlin ziemlich leer.
Inspired by @fastbillnews I moved my workplace this week to the black forest. My own private code camp! http://t.co/jxuqn2eAJH
@gr2m ist ein Campingplatz ...
@VaamoTech RSS or Atom feed would be nice ‚Ä¶
#CodeCamp Elztalblick http://t.co/XEHT4T1xk7
http://t.co/mYriOtViec has some interesting insights in the use of body cams for police forces.
Modern Nomad vs. Camping http://t.co/izlHTHODzg
@jezenthomas @benjamin I have a solid postfix conf for you. If it's for testing, use @Mailtrap ...
Modern Nomad vs. Sun http://t.co/4wyIUglNJH
@ddirkinho wir sind gerade hier: http://t.co/LMd9tjOiHm - @kamilleblumm macht Urlaub mit einer Freundin. Ich arbeite an @dotHIV.
@timohetzel @domsom ‚Ä¶ und es ist auch noch nicht eingesteckt  ‚Ä¶
@benjamin @jezenthomas https://t.co/CXIoCmFX8g is the conf I use for my root server which just needs to send mail for various domains.
@benjamin @jezenthomas for sending mails from prod I use external SMTP servers like Gmail, domainfactory, regfish.
Ordered my personal @dotHIV domain via @Key_Systems which will be available on on Tuesday at 4pm: http://t.co/fqx0vjNavp - did you already?
@PyUGRM habe hier eine Anfrage f√ºr Django Wartung / Aktualisierung. Wer m√∂chte? http://t.co/fvJRXZWLYd
CodeCamp Elztalblick is over. The next days I'll be charging my batteries for the @dotHIV launch next week. http://t.co/sTaUjtHXQf
@alipasha http://t.co/KRc36cVepJ has an application for your real estate research ...
I have a OnePlus One invite, want it?
@_destby_  you were the first so just send me your email ...
@_destby_ you've got mail.
@_destby_ Enjoy!
Modern Nomad vs. Volksmusik http://t.co/wgxX4aHKQA
.@dotHIV is the only of the 1,305 #newgTLDs with a charitable cause: http://t.co/bN6HLeXdAs
@_rubensk This chart is part of a talk I'll be giving on Monday. So can you point me to some background information for me to integrate?
@_rubensk https://t.co/b5mPtgsi4Q states that it is limited to ACRF affiliates and is used to promote the brand. Not a charity.
@_rubensk the wording they use is philanthropic. So they will be a non-profit providing domains for charities but not raising money.
@_rubensk No, I want to be able to safely claim the monopoly for us, and from what I read we still can. Thanks for the hint!
@Ookami86 das Zitat auf Slide 13 liest sich sehr komisch
@Ookami86 im Vortrag wird es sicher deutlich.
@Ookami86 besser!

With @dropbox charging $10 for 1TB/month and @spacemonkey  not living up to it's "we're fast because NAS" I see no value in using it.
@magicmonty what do I gain by using it?
@magicmonty Problem is, that relying on third parties for trusting others keys is insecured.
